Naturally.)"},{"lineNumber":57948,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だが、俺様がどれだけ言っても信じない奴はいる。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But no matter how much I say it, there are those who won't believe."},{"lineNumber":57949,"originalJapaneseLine":"　だから、詳しい事を聞いておきたい」","translatedEnglishLine":"Therefore, I want to hear the details.\""},{"lineNumber":57950,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……そう、ですね……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Yes, that's right...\""},{"lineNumber":57951,"originalJapaneseLine":"（総統は……味方になって、くれるんだ……）","translatedEnglishLine":"(The Supreme Commander... is going to be on my side...)"},
  
{"lineNumber":57952,"originalJapaneseLine":"「特に、あの勇者野郎のことだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Especially about that bastard hero.\""},
  
{"lineNumber":57953,"originalJapaneseLine":"「アリオス、の……？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Arios, you mean...?\""},
  
{"lineNumber":57954,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あいつは人類の敵だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"He's an enemy of humanity."},
  
{"lineNumber":57955,"originalJapaneseLine":"　君は知り合いだった、のか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Did you know him?\""},
  
{"lineNumber":57956,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……………………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"................\""},
  
{"lineNumber":57957,"originalJapaneseLine":"重い沈黙が、室内に降りた。","translatedEnglishLine":"A heavy silence fell upon the room."},
  
{"lineNumber":57958,"originalJapaneseLine":"「恋人、でした。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"We were lovers."},
  
{"lineNumber":57959,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私は…………そう、思っていました」","translatedEnglishLine":"I... thought so.\""},
  
{"lineNumber":57960,"originalJapaneseLine":"（……やはりか）","translatedEnglishLine":"(...I thought so.)"},
  
{"lineNumber":57961,"originalJapaneseLine":"「数年前……彼が、とある犯罪的な組織と","translatedEnglishLine":"\"A few years ago... when he was fighting against a certain criminal organization,"},
  
{"lineNumber":57962,"originalJapaneseLine":"　戦っていたときに、出会いました」","translatedEnglishLine":"I met him.\""},
  
{"lineNumber":57963,"originalJapaneseLine":"「組織は壊滅一歩手前で、イラーピュの墜落に","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The organization was on the brink of destruction and got caught up in the crash of Illapy,"},
  
{"lineNumber":57964,"originalJapaneseLine":"　巻き込まれて、消滅し……","translatedEnglishLine":"and vanished..."},{"lineNumber":57965,"originalJapaneseLine":"　彼とも、それで別れたきりでした」","translatedEnglishLine":"I parted ways with him after that.\""},
  
{"lineNumber":57966,"originalJapaneseLine":"「でも、ひとつ……約束をしていたんです。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But we made one promise."},
  
{"lineNumber":57967,"originalJapaneseLine":"　自由都市を、守ると……」","translatedEnglishLine":"To protect the Free City...\""},
  
{"lineNumber":57968,"originalJapaneseLine":"「奴と一緒にとか、そういう事か？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Do you mean together with him or something like that?\""},
  
{"lineNumber":57969,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いいえ。彼は、世界を守らなきゃならないから、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No. He has to protect the world,"},
  
{"lineNumber":57970,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ひとつ所に留まるわけにはいかない、と」","translatedEnglishLine":"so he can't stay in one place.\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 遠巻きに向けられる、疑念の目。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Doubtful eyes directed from a distance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 敗北の痛み。戦う理由。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The pain of defeat. The reason to fight.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それらが、セシルを代わる代わる責め苛んでいた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: These torments assailed Cecil one after another.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いかん……こんな、ことではっ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No... I can't be like this..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 頭を振って、弱さを追い払う。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She shook her head, driving away her weakness.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: と……そこに、ノックの音が響いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then... the sound of knocking echoed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「誰だ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Who is it?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺だ、セシル。開けるぞー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's me, Cecil. I'm opening the door."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無遠慮な宣言と共に、ランスが姿を現した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With an unceremonious declaration, Rance appeared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「総統……こんな……夜更けに、なんでしょう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Supreme Commander... what is it doing so late at night?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「込み入った話を朝っぱらにはできないからな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Because we can't discuss complicated matters early in the morning.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 聞きたい事がある。いいな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I have something I want to ask. Alright?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「は……はい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Y-yes."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 強い視線と言葉に押されるように、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Pushed by his strong gaze and words,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: セシルは半ば反射的に頷いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cecil nodded almost reflexively.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「総統も……私を、疑ってらっしゃるのですか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Supreme Commander, do you also... doubt me?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いいや、俺はまったく疑っていない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, I don't doubt you at all.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 信じてるぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I believe in you."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ……っ、はい……聞きました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah... yes... I've heard it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 総統は……私をかばって頂いていた、と……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That the Supreme Commander... was protecting me..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「当然だ。目を見れば分かる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Of course. You can tell by looking into my eyes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 信頼出来る目だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They are eyes you can trust."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 肩に軽く触れて、ランスは一直線にセシルの瞳を見る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lightly touching her shoulder, Rance looked directly into Cecil's eyes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （最初っからカチューシャだと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (From the beginning, I knew it was Kachusha,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クレインづてに知ってたからな。当然だ）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I found out through Crane. Naturally.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だが、俺様がどれだけ言っても信じない奴はいる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But no matter how much I say it, there are those who won't believe.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だから、詳しい事を聞いておきたい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Therefore, I want to hear the details."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……そう、ですね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Yes, that's right..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （総統は……味方になって、くれるんだ……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (The Supreme Commander... is going to be on my side...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「特に、あの勇者野郎のことだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Especially about that bastard hero."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「アリオス、の……？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Arios, you mean...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あいつは人類の敵だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "He's an enemy of humanity.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 君は知り合いだった、のか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Did you know him?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 重い沈黙が、室内に降りた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A heavy silence fell upon the room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「恋人、でした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We were lovers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私は…………そう、思っていました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I... thought so."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （……やはりか）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (...I thought so.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「数年前……彼が、とある犯罪的な組織と
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "A few years ago... when he was fighting against a certain criminal organization,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦っていたときに、出会いました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I met him."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「組織は壊滅一歩手前で、イラーピュの墜落に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The organization was on the brink of destruction and got caught up in the crash of Illapy,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 巻き込まれて、消滅し……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and vanished...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 彼とも、それで別れたきりでした」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I parted ways with him after that."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「でも、ひとつ……約束をしていたんです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But we made one promise.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自由都市を、守ると……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To protect the Free City..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「奴と一緒にとか、そういう事か？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Do you mean together with him or something like that?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いいえ。彼は、世界を守らなきゃならないから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No. He has to protect the world,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ひとつ所に留まるわけにはいかない、と」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so he can't stay in one place."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

output_text:

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 君は知り合いだった、のか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Did you know him?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 重い沈黙が、室内に降りた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A heavy silence fell upon the room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「恋人、でした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We were lovers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私は…………そう、思っていました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I... thought so."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （……やはりか）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (...I thought so.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「数年前……彼が、とある犯罪的な組織と
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "A few years ago... when he was fighting against a certain criminal organization,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦っていたときに、出会いました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I met him."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「組織は壊滅一歩手前で、イラーピュの墜落に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The organization was on the brink of destruction and got caught up in the crash of Illapy,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 巻き込まれて、消滅し……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and vanished...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 彼とも、それで別れたきりでした」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I parted ways with him after that."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「でも、ひとつ……約束をしていたんです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But we made one promise.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自由都市を、守ると……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To protect the Free City..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「奴と一緒にとか、そういう事か？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Do you mean together with him or something like that?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いいえ。彼は、世界を守らなきゃならないから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No. He has to protect the world,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ひとつ所に留まるわけにはいかない、と」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so he can't stay in one place."
